DOC.detailed_description: Targeting inflammatory response may rational approach medical treatment chronic periodontitis . Glucosamine sulphate ( GS ) proven anti-inflammatory action minimal side effect profile . Objectives ; The main objective study evaluate clinically efficacy GS ; novel adjunctive host modulating agent periodontal therapy investigate effect gingival crevicular fluid ( GCF ) level IL-1β . Methods ; Forty patient moderate severe chronic periodontitis ( CP ) include study . They randomly divide two group . Group I ( G1 ) patient ( n=20 ) receive 500 mg GS capsule three time daily 3 month follow full mouth scale root planing ( SRP ) , group II ( G2 ) patient ( n=20 ) receive placebo period follow full mouth SRP . Clinical periodontal parameter GCF IL-1β level analyze baseline 3 month follow therapy .
